objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='techGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#1a1a1a'/><stop offset='70%' stop-color='#0d0d0d'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#000000'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='orangeAccent' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#ff6b35'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#ff8c42'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#techGradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M0,300 Q270,250 540,300 T1080,300' stroke='#ff6b35' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M0,500 Q270,450 540,500 T1080,500' stroke='#ff6b35' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><path d='M0,700 Q270,650 540,700 T1080,700' stroke='#ff6b35' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/></g><g opacity='0.3'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='3' fill='#ff6b35'/><circle cx='980' cy='100' r='3' fill='#ff6b35'/><circle cx='100' cy='980' r='3' fill='#ff6b35'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='3' fill='#ff6b35'/><rect x='50' y='50' width='6' height='6' fill='#ff6b35' transform='rotate(45 53 53)'/><rect x='1024' y='50' width='6' height='6' fill='#ff6b35' transform='rotate(45 1027 53)'/><rect x='50' y='1024' width='6' height='6' fill='#ff6b35' transform='rotate(45 53 1027)'/><rect x='1024' y='1024' width='6' height='6' fill='#ff6b35' transform='rotate(45 1027 1027)'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M200,0 L220,0 L220,1080 L200,1080 Z' fill='url(#orangeAccent)'/><path d='M860,0 L880,0 L880,1080 L860,1080 Z' fill='url(#orangeAccent)'/></g></svg>

objects.text: 6 GB RAM | 17.22 cm Display | 64MP Camera | 5500 mAh Battery

product_details.description: NA 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM 17.22 cm (6.78 inch) Display 64MP Rear Camera | 13MP Front Camera 5500 mAh Battery Dimensity 7300 Ultimate Processor

banner_details:
The banner is a sleek, tech-themed promotional layout featuring a smartphone image prominently in the center. The background is composed of a radial gradient fading from deep gray to black, with subtle orange linear curves and tech-style embellishments on both sides. The banner includes a bold title at the top (`heading`), followed by a product model name and network specification (`subheading`). A specification line (`tagline`) provides storage and color variant details. Beneath the phone image (`product_image`), a short feature list (`description`) appears, followed by a highlighted price (`price`) and a rounded rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with the label text (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Background black: `#000000`
- Accent orange: `#ff6b35`
- Secondary orange gradient: `#ff8c42`
- White text: `#FFFFFF`
- Light gray text: `#cccccc`
product_color: The product image utilizes a sleek, futuristic color palette dominated by deep charcoal black (#1B1B1D) for the phone body, conveying precision and sophistication. Accents of vibrant orange (#FF6A00) highlight key design elements and branding, reinforcing energy and innovation. Cool cyan-blue lighting (#00F0FF) on the model’s skin contrasts sharply with the warm glow of neon orange goggles, creating powerful visual tension and depth. The background remains black (#000000), enhancing the product's sharp edges and futuristic appeal. For an advertisement, combining these contrasting tones—black, neon orange, cyan-blue, and white (#FFFFFF)—will emphasize performance, technology, and modern aesthetics.
